attributes.allegiance: House Tyrell'''House Ashford''' is a vassal house from the Reach that holds fealty to House Tyrell. Its seat is Ashford castle. Their seat is Ashford.==In the books==The Tourney of Ashford, hosted by House Ashford in 209 AL, 90 years before the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels begin, is where Ser Duncan the Tall first met young Aegon V Targaryen (known as "Egg"), beginning the ''Tales of Dunk and Egg''.==See also==*AWOIAF (spoilers from the books)Reach HousesCategory:Noble houses

'''House Ashford''' is a vassal house from [[the Reach]] that holds fealty to [[House Tyrell]]. Its seat is [[Ashford]] castle. Their seat is [[Ashford]].
sections.In the books: The Tourney of Ashford, hosted by House Ashford in 209 AL, 90 years before the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels begin, is where Ser [[Duncan the Tall]] first met young [[Aegon V Targaryen]] (known as "Egg"), beginning the ''[[Tales of Dunk and Egg]]''.
